name: sport
description:
The sport command extracts sports venues, pitches, and facilities from OSM data. Categories include:

- Ball: soccer, basketball, tennis, cricket, golf, etc.
- Water: swimming, diving, sailing, rowing, surfing
- Fitness: gym, yoga, crossfit, weightlifting
- Cycling: cycling, BMX, mountain biking
- Athletics: running, track, marathons
- Combat: boxing, martial arts, fencing
- Winter: skiing, ice skating, curling

Includes surface type, lighting, and area calculations.

options.-s, --sport: Filter by sport (soccer, tennis, swimming, etc.)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: ball, water, fitness, cycling, athletics, combat, winter, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Sports facilities with:
- sport: Sport type(s)
- leisure: Facility type (pitch, sports_centre, etc.)
- name: Facility name
- surface: Playing surface
- lit: Has lighting
- covered: Is covered/indoor
- area_sqm: Area in square meters
